channel.title: Clarity on davidstamen.com
channel.description: Recent content in Clarity on davidstamen.com

item.title: vCenter Server Appliance CLI - JSON Creator
item.description: I am proud to announce that my first VMware Clarity Project the VCSA JSON Creator is now live! This has been something I have wanted to do for some time, and am glad to finally have the first version available for feedback. Let's dive in and take a look.
